A **shadow** is a monster added in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"). They are not randomly generated and will only appear on the [Lawful Quest](/wiki/Lawful_Quest "Lawful Quest"), and in the [Lost Tomb](/wiki/Special_level_\(SLASH%27EM\)#The_Lost_Tomb "Special level (SLASH'EM)"). They share many properties with [shades](/wiki/Shade "Shade").

## Encyclopedia Entry

Shades are undead creatures. They differ from zombies in that a zombie is an undead animation of a corpse, while a shade is an undead creature magically created by the use of black magic.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Shadow\&action=edit)*
html:
Shadow

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
  shadow
Difficulty 9
Attacks Touch 1d4 poison, Touch 1d4 cold
  shadow
Difficulty 9
Attacks

Touch 1d4 poison, Touch 1d4 cold

Base level 4
Base experience 83
Speed 9
Base AC 4
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 0
Size Medium
Resistances cold, disintegration, sleep, poison, petrification, level drain
Resistances conveyed None

A shadow:

  • can fly.
  • can phase through walls.
  • does not breathe.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is undead.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • wanders randomly.
  • is nasty.
  • never leaves a corpse.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line3979

A shadow is a monster added in SLASH'EM. They are not randomly generated and will only appear on the Lawful Quest, and in the Lost Tomb. They share many properties with shades.


Encyclopedia Entry

Shades are undead creatures. They differ from zombies in that a zombie is an undead animation of a corpse, while a shade is an undead creature magically created by the use of black magic.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''shadow''' is a monster added in [[SLASH'EM]]. They are not randomly generated and will only appear on the [[Lawful Quest]], and in the [[Special level (SLASH'EM)#The_Lost_Tomb|Lost Tomb]]. They share many properties with [[shade]]s.
